captions.text: The President: Clint, Tim --

Clint Dempsey: Hello, Mr.
President, how's it going?

Tim Howard: Hello,
Mr. President.

The President: Man, I just
wanted to call to say
you guys did us proud.
Tim Howard: Thank you very much.

The President: Yeah, the -- no,
no, you guys just did great,

and, as somebody whose
first sport was soccer,

although I was never that
good, to see the way

you guys captured the
hearts and the imaginations

of the whole country,
is unbelievable.

And obviously, the sport's been
growing steadily just because

so many kids are playing
it at a young age.

But, yeah, this was the first
time where I think you really

ended up having an
entire country focused.
And, Clint, you were fantastic.

And, Tim, I think, you know, I
don't know how you're going

to survive the mobs when
you come back home, man.
(laughter)

The President: You're just
like -- you're going to have

to shave your beard so they
don't know who you are.
(laughter)

Tim Howard: Well, we
heard you were watching,

and we know how big of
a supporter you are.
So hopefully we made you proud.

It was our honor, as it always
is, to represent our country.

The President: Well, you
guys all did us proud,

not just by how hard you played,
and how well you did, but also,

yeah, you guys just carry
yourselves with a lot of class.

And, it makes people
really respect this sport,

and you guys are really
great models for

a lot of sportsman
here in the States.

So, I know it's
disappointing, but, what you

guys accomplished is
really, really significant,

and it'll make a
difference in the country.

So, congratulate coach,
and I know maybe

you got a couple
of the guys there.

Fantastic job, everybody,
and I hope I get a chance

to see you guys again at the
White House sometime soon.

I still got my jacket
that you guys gave me.
(laughter)

Clint Dempsey: All
right, awesome.
Thank you, sir, I appreciate it.

The President: All right,
appreciate you guys.
Safe travels back.

Tim Howard: Thanks
for your call --
The President: You bet, bye-bye.

title: Raw Video: President Obama Calls Clint Dempsey & Tim Howard
